# Code Review Template

Use this template when conducting code reviews or asking for review feedback.

**Review Date:** [Date]

## Code Quality Review

### Architecture & Design
- [ ] Design decisions are sound
- [ ] Code follows project architecture
- [ ] SOLID principles respected
- [ ] Appropriate design patterns used

**Questions/Suggestions:**
- 

### Implementation
- [ ] Code is clean and readable
- [ ] Variable/function names are meaningful
- [ ] Functions are appropriately sized
- [ ] DRY principle followed
- [ ] No unnecessary complexity

**Questions/Suggestions:**
- 

### Testing
- [ ] Unit tests present and meaningful
- [ ] Integration tests cover scenarios
- [ ] Edge cases considered
- [ ] Test names clearly describe behavior
- [ ] Good test coverage

**Questions/Suggestions:**
- 

### Security & Safety
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets
- [ ] Input validation present
- [ ] Error handling appropriate
- [ ] No vulnerabilities identified
- [ ] Sensitive data handled correctly

**Questions/Suggestions:**
- 

### Performance
- [ ] No obvious bottlenecks
- [ ] Database queries optimized
- [ ] Caching used appropriately
- [ ] Async patterns applied
- [ ] Resource management proper

**Questions/Suggestions:**
- 

### Documentation
- [ ] Code is self-documenting
- [ ] Complex sections commented
- [ ] API docs updated
- [ ] README updated if needed
- [ ] Commit messages clear

**Questions/Suggestions:**
-
